title: afk plus the remake system problem
body: why on earth do i get afk when my computer crash and  league doesnt respond? how can i reconnect that way? and remake system just kills those innocent people who try to reconnect before the game actually start. this system is unfair because it doesnt see whether your reconnecting or not. can riot please do something?

replies.body: Hey there, [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) is going to treat everyone equally regardless of intent.  This is because it still causes others a negative experience, so it's important to resolve whatever is causing these crashes.  Toss me more info on what's happening exactly, I'd love to help get this fixed up.

well my comeputer suddently went to sleep first, and than i turn it on and it was just 1 min after in the waiting time. at the same time the bug splat thing shows up and i tried to reconnect so i cancel it. but right after that the whole league client went not working, and doesnt work either for the first time i reopen it. until the second time it works and i reconnect.after few second in the waiting time theres a pop out sign saying the game has ended, feel free to play another one. than i click it, and got afk
